resources.string: The characters above should match the Kanji shown below:

"Your device is showing Chinese characters instead of Kanji!

Click the "Apply Fix" button below to prioritize Japanese Kanji instead. A device reboot will be required to see any changes.

Below is an example of what your current font looks like:"

"Your device is showing Kanji. You're all set!

Click the "Revert" button below to restore your original fonts. A device reboot will be required.

Below is an example of what your current font looks like:"

"Your device is showing Kanji. You're all set!

No backup of your original file was found, but we can try to revert using the stock Android fonts.

If your ROM uses custom fonts, you may not want to try this.

Below is an example of what your current font looks like:"
